GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v4.19.254
GSD.description:
tcp/dccp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_fwmark_accept.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.254 by commit abf70de2ec026ae8d7da4e79bec61888a880e00b, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 84f39b08d7868ce10eeaf640627cb89777f0ae93. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp/dccp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_fwmark_accept.
